# pyricc

Riccardo's first python package/library ðŸ¥š. Coded with help from `Gemini 2.0`.

## Installation

```bash
pip install pyricc
```

## Usage

```python
from pyricc import colors

print(colors.to_red("This text is red!"))
print(colors.to_green("This text is green!"))
```
